history.content: I no longer eat meat; switched to pescatarian.
I stopped drinking coffee; now it's green tea in the mornings.

gold.content: User switched from coffee to green tea.

history.content: I left Meta; joined OpenAI as a research engineer.

gold.content: User works at OpenAI as a research engineer.

history.content: I used to hate running but now I enjoy it and do 10k on weekends.

gold.content: User enjoys running and does 10k on weekends.

history.content: I've progressed from beginner to intermediate in Python this year.
